name: Jerk Off BBQ
description: We provide West Indian street food and big barbecue flavours using our barbecue drum. We cook a range of foods from around the Caribbean from our Guyanese plant-based channa, spinach & potato, to our Bajan coo-coo and Jamaican jerk chicken. We only use quality ingredients and everything is homemade from our jerk seasoning marinade to our sweet & spicy scotch bonnet chilli jam. We are delivering meals every Saturday to heat up at home, to all South East London postcodes. Minimum spend Â£12, free delivery. We take orders all week, with a cutoff of 12 pm Friday. Delivery is then on Saturday between 11 am and 5 pm.
safetyTips: At this time, orders will only be accepted if they are prepaid with a debit or credit card to ensure the experience is truly contact-free online. All our deliveries are curbside meaning the delivery will be placed in the desired location on your premises (requests can be made in the delivery notes) before moving back to a safe distance. We have a 5-star hygiene rating and maintaining the highest health and safety standards is always our top priority. We are continually monitoring the situation and ensuring we are following the latest governmental advice. We will continue to update our policies and guidance as appropriate to ensure a safe environment.
